Class LocalDeclarationNode

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParameterNode

    public class LocalDeclarationNode
extends LocalVariableNode
    LocalVariableNode extension that represents the declaration of local variable.
    Since:
    v0.2.4 Jan 5, 2014 at 9:10:49 PM
    Version:
    v0.2.13 Jun 17, 2014 at 8:45:35 AM
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak

      • decodeStatement

        public static LocalDeclarationNode decodeStatement(TreeNode parent,
                                   java.lang.String statement,
                                   Location location,
                                   boolean require,
                                   boolean scope)
        Decode the given statement into a LocalDeclarationNode instance, if possible. If it is not possible, this method returns null.
        Example inputs include:
        • int index
        • constant char c
        • String name
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent node of the statement.
        statement - The statement to try to decode into a LocalDeclarationNode instance.
        location - The location of the statement in the source code.
        require - Whether or not to throw an error if anything goes wrong.
        scope - Whether or not the given statement is the beginning of a scope.
        Returns:
        The generated node, if it was possible to translated it into a LocalDeclarationNode.

      • interactWord

        public void interactWord(java.lang.String word,
                int wordNumber,
                Bounds bounds,
                int numWords,
                java.lang.String leftDelimiter,
                java.lang.String rightDelimiter,
                TreeNode.ExtraData data)
        Description copied from class: TreeNode
        Method that is to be overridden. Whenever the iterateWords(String) method is called, this method will be called with the specific word and the number (order) the word came in the statement.
        Overrides:
        interactWord in class TreeNode
        Parameters:
        word - The word that was found.
        wordNumber - The index of the word on a word-by-word basis.
        bounds - The bounds of the word that was found.
        numWords - The number of words that were parsed.
        leftDelimiter - The text that is between the previous word and the current word.
        rightDelimiter - The text that is between the current word and the next word.
        data - The extra data that may or may not be needed for the interactWord() methods.
        See Also:
        TreeNode.interactWord(java.lang.String, int, net.fathomsoft.nova.util.Bounds, int, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, net.fathomsoft.nova.tree.TreeNode.ExtraData)
